Certainly! There are many other current fashion trends that you can incorporate into your wardrobe to stay on-trend without wearing an oversized blazer. Here are some other trend-driven pieces that can be styled in a variety of ways:

- Midi and maxi dresses in fun prints or bold colors
- Cropped or fitted cardigans
- Wide-leg pants or culottes
- Statement T-shirts or tops with bold graphic designs
- High-waisted jeans with a straight leg or flare
- Chunky platform sneakers or sandals
- Coordinating sets, such as matching pants and blouses or shorts and jackets
- Boxy or fitted blouses with playful details such as puffed sleeves or ruffled cuffs
- Structure handbags in bright colors

Remember that the most important thing is to choose pieces that make you feel confident and comfortable, and that fit your personal style. You can always incorporate new trends in small ways by accessorizing with jewelry or shoes that are on-trend.
